author: rgardler
msg: pass the documentPath to the stylesheet, this is used to calculate relative paths in links. This is needed to allow the site to be hosted somehwhoere other than the root of the server.

author: rgardler
msg: don't use absolute paths as this prevents the site being hosted anywhere other than the root of the server
